snippet.title: Daisy's Crazy Adventure - Hack of Super Mario World [SNES]
snippet.description:
Hack made by BlueSheep123
https://www.smwcentral.net/?p=section&a=details&id=38070
Submitted: 2024-07-07

Daisy's Crazy Adventure is a choco-nilla hack with standard-normal difficulty. In this adventure, the evil alien Tatanga has returned to Sarasaland! He has taken over Daisy's entire empire and kidnapped Luigi. It's up to our hero, Daisy, to rescue Luigi and bring back peace to Sarasaland.

The hack is loosely inspired by Super Mario Land and features:

4 worlds with 17 exits (including 4 bosses, resulting in 13 levels)
Each level introduces and expands upon a unique gimmick
Custom music sourced from various games and composers
Custom bosses
Custom ASM (UberASM, blocks, sprites, level code)
A minimalist HUD
Custom graphics"

PLAYLISTS:

I'm not the creator of any of these games; all credit goes to the authors.

#snes #supermario #romhack
